Legal_Issue: Whether the Commission erred in declining to deal with the complaint due to lack of discriminatory evidence and time limit violations
Application_Facts: Applicant claimed sex discrimination but provided insufficient evidence; position eliminated in 2002, complaint filed in 2003 (over one-year limit); mediation outcomes did not prove discrimination
Decision_Outcome: Commission did not err; application for judicial review dismissed
Court_Ruling: Application dismissed; costs awarded to respondent
Legal_Standard: Standard of review applied to Commission's decision under Canadian Human Rights Act
Assessment_Factor: Timeliness of complaint, sufficiency of evidence
Applicable_Legislation: Canadian Human Rights Act, section 41(1)(c) and (e)
Procedural_Issue: Complaint filed over one year after alleged act
Review_Standard: Reasonableness or correctness standard in administrative law (implied)
Evidence_Used: Mediation outcomes, timing of complaint, lack of direct evidence of discrimination
Legal_Provision_Cited: Canadian Human Rights Act, section 41(1)(c) and (e)
Application_Basis: Insufficient evidence of discrimination and late filing
Evidence_Assessed: Lack of discriminatory evidence, delay in filing
Relief_Sought: Judicial review to compel Commission to process complaint
Governing_Rule: Commission may decline complaints lacking evidence of discrimination or filed beyond one-year limit
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Insufficient evidence to support claim of sex discrimination
Cause_Description: Applicant's dissatisfaction with Commission's refusal to process her discrimination complaint
Evidence_Handling: Commission assessed evidence and found it inadequate to proceed
Evidence_Issues: Lack of timely and sufficient evidence
Legal_Provision: Canadian Human Rights Act, section 41(1)(c) and (e)
Jurisdictional_Issue: Time limit for filing complaint under Commission's jurisdiction
Evidence_Assessment: Complaint filed too late and without sufficient proof of discrimination
Decision_Rationale: No error by Commission in declining complaint due to untimeliness and lack of evidence
Legal_Standard_Applied: Administrative law standards of review applied to Commission decisions
